verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: In remarks prior to a bilateral meeting at the G7] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: joked] [ARG1: that Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau has agreed to cut all tariffs and trade barriers between the U.S. and Canada] .

In remarks prior to a bilateral meeting at the G7 , President Donald Trump joked that Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau [V: has] agreed to cut all tariffs and trade barriers between the U.S. and Canada .

In remarks prior to a bilateral meeting at the G7 , President Donald Trump joked that [ARG0: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau] has [V: agreed] [ARG1: to cut all tariffs and trade barriers between the U.S. and Canada] .

In remarks prior to a bilateral meeting at the G7 , President Donald Trump joked that [ARG0: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau] has agreed to [V: cut] [ARG1: all tariffs and trade barriers between the U.S. and Canada] .
